messages.message:
@joshbronko is your ask to run Refiner fields in parallel instead of sequentially? That is a pretty big lift because right now, we don't parse out the dependency graph of fields from left to right, so we don't know which fields can be run in parallel vs. sequentially. Also, we would need to load test to see if this affects Flow run times since they batch at the file level, not field level.

Can you describe more the problems you're running into? What speed issues are you experiencing?
Llm running in serial causes long refiner run times. If you have 10 fields each taking 10-15 seconds to respond you are at 100-150 seconds versus 10-15 seconds to run them all
@Tom Deaney @Dan H @Raul MÃ¤chler you all have seen this with latest pocs
